H0.text: Athos and Porthos are two of the 3 musketeers, name the other one.. D'Artagnan

H1.text: Athos and Porthos are two of the 3 musketeers, name the other one.. Rochefort

H2.text: Athos and Porthos are two of the 3 musketeers, name the other one.. Treville

H3.text: Athos and Porthos are two of the 3 musketeers, name the other one.. Aramis

A4.text: In The Three Musketeers, Athos, Porthos, and Aramis are friends of the novel's protagonist, d'Artagnan.
